episode_event_academy_winter_battle/8301:
How’re you doing? We’re both here, so let’s
have a battle!
episode_event_academy_winter_battle/8302:
Hello there! Would you like to collaborate
on a piece I’m working on?
episode_event_academy_winter_battle/8303:
It’s time to have a battle against Captain
Mina! Gimme all you got!
episode_event_academy_winter_battle/8304: Time for a photo op! Show me your best!
episode_event_academy_winter_battle/8305:
Welcome, challenger! I’m Sidney, the proctor
of this exam.

No need to get all stiff and nervous ’cause
it’s a test. Just have fun with it!

And that’s that! You passed with flying
colors!

Go enjoy your time at the academy until
your next exam!
episode_event_academy_winter_battle/8306:
I’m Lance, the Dragon-type master! I’ll be
proctoring your final exam!

Now, let’s begin! Your challenge ends
with me!

This is how you as a Trainer will continue to
grow stronger with your Pokémon.
episode_event_academy_winter_battle/8307:
As a teacher, I will do my duty to guide my
pupils and aid their growth.
episode_event_academy_winter_battle/8308:
Hmph! Very well. Let us begin creating our
collaborative work of art!
